snippet: It appears Clearwire investors think Monday's deal bodes well for the future of the company, despite an explicit warning that Sprint's pact with SoftBank does not require any takeover of the wireless network operator.
abstract: It appears Clearwire investors think Monday's deal bodes well for the future of the company, despite an explicit warning that Sprint's pact with SoftBank does not require any takeover of the wireless network operator.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Clearwire Investors Bet on Inevitability of a Deal With Sprint
